00017 bool CConfiguration::saveCfgFile()
00018 {
00019  std::ofstream file;
00020  if(!OpenGameFileW(file, m_filename))
00021   return false;
00022 
00023  SectionMap::iterator sect = m_sections.begin();
00024  for(; sect != m_sections.end() ; sect++)
00025  {
00026   file << "[" + sect->first + "]";
00027   file << std::endl;
00028 
00029   Section &current = sect->second;
00030   Section::iterator keyword = current.begin();
00031   for(; keyword != current.end() ; keyword++)
00032    file << (keyword->first + " = " + keyword->second + "\n");
00033   file << std::endl;
00034  }
00035  file.close();
00036  return true;
00037 }

00044 void CConfiguration::WriteString(const std::string& section, const std::string& key, const std::string& string)
00045 {
00046  // Set the section
00047  SectionMap::iterator sect = m_sections.find(section);
00048  if (sect == m_sections.end())
00049  {
00050   // The section doesn't exist, create a new one.
00051   Section newSection;
00052   newSection[key] = string;
00053   m_sections[section] = newSection;
00054   return;
00055  }
00056 
00057  // Set the key=value pair
00058  Section::iterator item = sect->second.find(key);
00059  if (item == sect->second.end())
00060  {
00061   sect->second.insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>(key,string));
00062   return;
00063  }
00064 
00065  item->second = string;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CConfiguration::SetKeyword(const std::string &section, const std::string &keyword, const bool value)
00069 {
00070  WriteString(section, keyword, value ? "true" : "false");
00071 }
00072 
00073 void CConfiguration::WriteInt(const std::string &section, const std::string &keyword, const int value)
00074 {
00075  WriteString(section, keyword, to_string(value) );
00076 }
